font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 使丰满： to mingle or permeate with some modifying, alleviating, or vivifying element
【例】 He needs to leaven his speeches with more humor. 他需要在演讲中再加入点幽默元素。
【近】 imbue, infuse灌输；使充满；浸渍, ingrain使…根深蒂固, inoculate, inspire, permeate, steep, suffuse
【反】 extract 抽取
【记】 leaf, f=ve，叶子腐烂后可以发酵
